Package support.menu

Class BaseListMenu

java.lang.Object
support.menu.BaseMenu
support.menu.BaseListMenu
Direct Known Subclasses:
AssistantsOnShiftList, BaseCreateMenu, BookableRoomList, BookingsList
public class BaseListMenu
extends BaseMenu
Extension of BaseMenu which prioritises the displaying of lists over interaction, this can be used to list out specific objects (using their .toString() method), such as Room objects.

    • printStream

      public java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream printStream()
      Same as BaseMenu.printStream(), but outputs a different style of view. Most notably, the list items start at number 11, not 1.
      Overrides:
      printStream in class BaseMenu
      Returns:
      A stream which can be converted to a string, this is what will be displayed on screen
